song.englishname: Awesome Is the Lord Most High

english.segment1: Great are You, Lord, Mighty in strength. You are faithful, as You will ever be. We will praise You all of our days. For Your glory, we offer everything
english.segment2: Raise your hands, all you nations. Shout to God all creation. How awesome is the Lord Most High
english.segment3: Where You send us, God we will go. You're the answer, we want the world to know. We will trust You when You call our name. Where You lead us, we'll follow all the way
english.segment4: Raise your hands, all you nations. Shout to God all creation. How awesome is the Lord Most High
english.segment5: We will praise You together. For now and forever. How awesome is the Lord Most High
english.segment6: Hallelujah, Hallelujah. How awesome is the Lord Most High. Hallelujah, Hallelujah. How awesome is the Lord Most High
english.segment7: Raise your hands, all you nations. Shout to God all creation. How awesome is the Lord Most High
english.segment8: We will praise You together. For now and forever. How awesome is the Lord Most High
